posts.post_content:
Hi all

I am a serious buyer and have cash ready....I am looking for a good head start on a t206 group of cards.  Willing to consider graded or raw, lower grade is just fine....

Looking to consider any and all offers leaning toward quantity....but also willing to find and pay for some nice HOF-ers (cobb, etc).

Hello monster!

thanks,
jim parker
parker_cards

I have hundreds of t206 for sale.  I have a bunch of graded and ungraded in various conditions.  most the ungraded are in the PR to VG range.  Could work with you on putting together a great starter lot.  I used to be a dealer who specialized in just T206 but I have been selling off all of my inventory to fund my new app [url]www.sportscardscanner.com[/url].  Send me a PM and let me know what sort of budget you are working with and we can start to put together a lot for you.  I have plenty of references on this site and others, am the owner of t206cards.com, and my ebay store is t206cards-com.  

Fred
Thanks Fred.  I would look to grab a large lot, pm sent.
grabbed one great lot, and looking for more....

Still buying!!!


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Still buying!   let me know what you have!
